identifier: 2022--03--01--en--myrss--David E. Sanger, Julian E. Barnes and Kate Conger--NewsArticle--https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2F2022%2F02%2F28%2Fus%2Fpolitics%2Fukraine-russia-microsoft.html
headline: Tech Companies Help Defend Ukraine Against Cyberattacks
description: After years of talks about the need for public-private partnerships to combat cyberattacks, the war in Ukraine is stress-testing the system.

author.name: David E. Sanger, Julian E. Barnes and Kate Conger

headline_zh-Hans: 科技公司帮助乌克兰抵御网络攻击
headline_zh-Hant: 科技公司幫助烏克蘭抵禦網絡攻擊
description_zh-Hans: 在多年来谈论打击网络攻击的公私伙伴关系的必要性之后，乌克兰的战争正在对该系统进行压力测试。
description_zh-Hant: 在多年來談論打擊網絡攻擊的公私夥伴關係的必要性之後，烏克蘭的戰爭正在對該系統進行壓力測試。
